title: Ticket #6530: late materialization: relative paths wrong w/ InitialDir
description:
Some relative paths are constructed differently with late materialization than without if InitialDir is specified in the submit file:

  • If InitialDir itself is relative, Iwd (in the job ad) is relative to /var/log/condor instead of submit directory
  • Cmd is relative to InitialDir instead of submit directory

Also, FACTORY.Iwd is set to the submit directory -- should it be InitialDir?
